attributes.action: Return Sunday To A Day Of Rest
attributes.additional_details: To bring us in-line with Germany and other European Countries, return Sundays to a day of rest so people can at least enjoy ONE day in the garden without having to put up with someone banging the hell out of something with a hammer or playing music that they think everyone else in the neighbourhood will really enjoy. Ban all retail shops from trading on Sundays as well as the use of lawn mowers, drills, and any other type of machinery. Keep Sundays peaceful.
